thread.title: Hotel de France Invalides disappoints
thread.title_full: Hotel de France Invalides disappoints - Review of Hotel de France Invalides, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: nycmcd
title: Hotel de France Invalides disappoints
text: This Hotel is in a central location. I checked in around 10 PM and was welcomed by the desk but not informed that there was an issue with the plumbing. I was advised that this would be corrected after one hour. this was not the case so I checked out after a one night stay.
